DOC.brief_summary: To study the effect of the P-glycoprotein inhibitor ritonavir on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of afatinib depending on the timepoint of ritonavir administration
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Ritonavir Effects on Afatinib Exposure in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
